articles.author: PHILIP MARCELO
articles.title: A famed NYC museum is closing two Native American halls. Harvard and others have taken similar steps - The Associated Press
articles.description: New York City’s American Museum of Natural History is closing two halls featuring Native American objects. The museum's president told staff in a letter Friday about the weekend closures that the exhibits are “severely outdated” and contain culturally sensiti…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) New Yorks American Museum of Natural History is closing two halls featuring Native American objects starting Saturday, acknowledging the exhibits are severely outdated and contain cultu… [+4480 chars]
